MentionsPage.fm4all-s-engage-a-ce-que-la-collecte-et-: FM4ALL ensures that the collection and processing of your data from the website www.fm4all.com comply with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) and the French Data Protection Act.
MentionsPage.les-donnees-personnelles-collectees-sur-: The personal data collected on the site include, but are not limited to: name, first name, email address, and phone number. These data are collected as part of information requests, quotes, or when subscribing to our services.

The user also acknowledges having verified that the computer configuration used contains no viruses and is in perfect working order.
MentionsPage.6-conditions-dutilisation-du-site: 6. Terms of Use of the Website
MentionsPage.l-utilisation-du-site-www-fm4all-com-imp: Using the website www.fm4all.com implies full and complete acceptance of the general terms of use described below. These terms of use may be modified or supplemented at any time, so users of the site are invited to consult them regularly.

ConfidentialitePage.chez-fm4all-societe-par-actions-simplifi: At fm4all, a simplified joint-stock company (in the process of registration, SIRET number: 941 928 640 00015, located at 3 rue de Nantes, 75019 Paris, we place great importance on protecting your personal data.
ConfidentialitePage.la-presente-politique-de-confidentialite: This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, share, and protect your data in accordance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) and the French Data Protection Act.
ConfidentialitePage.le-responsable-du-traitement-des-donnees: The data controller is fm4all, a simplified joint-stock company (in the process of registration, SIRET number: 941 928 640 00015, located at 3 rue de Nantes, 75019 Paris. You can contact us for any questions regarding data protection at the following address: admin@fm4all.com.
ConfidentialitePage.2-quelles-donnees-personnelles-collecton: 2. What personal data do we collect?
ConfidentialitePage.nous-collectons-les-categories-de-donnee: We collect the following categories of personal data:
ConfidentialitePage.nom-prenom-adresse-e-mail-numero-de-tele: Name, first name, email address, phone number, postal address, company name.
ConfidentialitePage.base-legale-interet-legitime-profilage-p: Legal basis: Legitimate interest (profiling to offer relevant services).
ConfidentialitePage.adresse-ip-donnees-de-navigation-sur-not: IP address, browsing data on our website (session cookies for site functionality, Google Analytics audience analysis cookies with anonymized IPs to improve our services).
ConfidentialitePage.base-legale-consentement-pour-les-cookie: Legal basis: Consent for non-essential cookies, legitimate interest for cookies strictly necessary for site functionality.
ConfidentialitePage.donnees-relatives-aux-demandes-de-devis-: Data related to quote requests and services
ConfidentialitePage.type-de-service-demande-date-de-la-deman: Type of service requested, request date, estimated budget, description of needs, information on contacted providers, concluded contracts, service evaluations.
ConfidentialitePage.base-legale-execution-du-contrat-mise-en: Legal basis: Contract execution (facilitating connections, service follow-up).
ConfidentialitePage.3-pourquoi-collectons-nous-vos-donnees-p: 3. Why do we collect your personal data?
ConfidentialitePage.nous-collectons-vos-donnees-personnelles: We collect your personal data for the following purposes:
ConfidentialitePage.mise-en-relation-avec-des-prestataires-d: Connecting with general service providers, managing quote requests, service follow-up, invoicing.
ConfidentialitePage.communication-avec-les-utilisateurs-supp: Communication with users, customer support, complaint handling.
ConfidentialitePage.base-legale-execution-du-contrat-interet: Legal basis: Contract execution, legitimate interest (improving customer relationship).
ConfidentialitePage.analyse-des-donnees-d-utilisation-de-not: Analysis of usage data from our platform (with anonymized data when possible), development of new features.
ConfidentialitePage.base-legale-interet-legitime-amelioratio: Legal basis: Legitimate interest (continuous improvement of our services).
ConfidentialitePage.sous-reserve-de-votre-consentement-expli: Subject to your explicit consent (dedicated checkbox), we may use your data to send you information about our services and promotional offers. You can withdraw your consent at any time by clicking the unsubscribe link in each email or by contacting us at the address mentioned in point 1.
ConfidentialitePage.gestion-des-obligations-comptables-et-fi: Management of accounting and tax obligations, response to requests from competent authorities.
ConfidentialitePage.4-qui-sont-les-destinataires-de-vos-donn: 4. Who are the recipients of your data?
ConfidentialitePage.vos-donnees-personnelles-peuvent-etre-co: Your personal data may be shared with the following recipients:
ConfidentialitePage.les-prestataires-de-services-references-: Service providers listed on our platform
ConfidentialitePage.uniquement-les-informations-necessaires-: Only the information necessary for the connection and execution of the service (e.g., the name and contact details of the client company, the type of service requested).
ConfidentialitePage.en-cas-d-obligation-legale-ou-de-demande: In case of legal obligation or judicial request.
ConfidentialitePage.nous-nous-assurons-que-nos-partenaires-e: We ensure that our partners and providers meet the same data protection requirements as ours, notably through contracts including the European Commission's standard contractual clauses if transfers outside the EU occur.
ConfidentialitePage.5-combien-de-temps-conservons-nous-vos-d: 5. How long do we retain your data?
ConfidentialitePage.nous-conservons-vos-donnees-personnelles: We retain your personal data for the following durations:
ConfidentialitePage.tant-que-le-compte-est-actif-et-pendant-: As long as the account is active and for 3 years after account deletion to handle potential claims.
ConfidentialitePage.donnees-relatives-aux-demandes-de-devis-: Data related to quote requests and services
ConfidentialitePage.3-ans-apres-la-fin-de-la-prestation-ou-l: 3 years after the end of the service or the last active contact, unless a longer legal retention period applies (e.g., 10 years for invoices).
ConfidentialitePage.3-ans-apres-le-dernier-contact-actif: 3 years after the last active contact.
ConfidentialitePage.10-ans-conformement-aux-obligations-lega: 10 years in accordance with legal obligations.
ConfidentialitePage.voir-notre-politique-de-cookies-pour-la-: See our cookie policy for the specific retention duration of each cookie.
ConfidentialitePage.conformement-a-la-reglementation-applica: In accordance with applicable regulations, you have the following rights:
ConfidentialitePage.vous-pouvez-obtenir-la-confirmation-que-: You can obtain confirmation that your data is being processed and request access to it.
ConfidentialitePage.vous-pouvez-demander-la-correction-de-do: You can request the correction of inaccurate or incomplete data.
ConfidentialitePage.vous-pouvez-demander-la-suppression-de-v: You can request the deletion of your data in certain cases (e.g., if the data is no longer necessary for the purposes for which it was collected).
ConfidentialitePage.vous-pouvez-demander-la-suspension-tempo: You can request the temporary suspension of data processing in certain cases.
ConfidentialitePage.vous-pouvez-vous-opposer-au-traitement-d: You can object to the processing of your data for legitimate reasons, particularly for commercial prospecting purposes.
ConfidentialitePage.vous-pouvez-recuperer-vos-donnees-dans-u: You can retrieve your data in a structured and machine-readable format.
ConfidentialitePage.droit-d-introduire-une-reclamation-aupre: Right to lodge a complaint with the CNIL
ConfidentialitePage.si-vous-estimez-que-vos-droits-ne-sont-p: If you believe your rights are not being respected, you can contact the CNIL (French Data Protection Authority).
ConfidentialitePage.pour-exercer-vos-droits-vous-pouvez-nous: To exercise your rights, you can contact us by email at admin@fm4all.com or by mail at the address mentioned in point 1. Please include a copy of your ID with your request.
ConfidentialitePage.notre-site-web-utilise-des-cookies-pour-: Our website uses cookies. To learn more about the types of cookies we use, their purpose, and how to manage them, please see our
ConfidentialitePage.une-banniere-de-consentement-aux-cookies: . A cookie consent banner is displayed during your first visit to our site.
ConfidentialitePage.nous-mettons-en-oeuvre-des-mesures-de-se: We implement appropriate technical and organizational security measures to protect your personal data against unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, or destruction, including data encryption in transit (HTTPS), access control to data, and intrusion protection measures.
ConfidentialitePage.nous-nous-reservons-le-droit-de-modifier: We reserve the right to modify this privacy policy at any time. Changes will be published on our website, and we will inform you of significant changes via a message on the platform or by email.

CookiesPage.la-presente-politique-relative-aux-cooki: This cookies policy explains how fm4all ("we", "our", "us") uses cookies and similar technologies on its website https://www.fm4all.com (the "Site").
CookiesPage.les-cookies-sont-de-petits-fichiers-text: Cookies are small text files that are placed on your computer or mobile device when you visit a website. They are widely used to make websites work more efficiently and to provide information to the site owners.
CookiesPage.nous-utilisons-les-types-de-cookies-suiv: We use the following types of cookies:
CookiesPage.ces-cookies-sont-essentiels-au-fonctionn: These cookies are essential for the functioning of the Site and allow you to use its basic features, such as navigating pages and accessing secure areas. These cookies do not collect any information about you that could be used for marketing purposes or to remember the websites you have visited. Legal basis: Legitimate interest.
CookiesPage.ces-cookies-nous-permettent-de-compter-l: These cookies allow us to count visits and traffic sources to measure and improve the performance of our Site. They help us know which pages are the most and least popular and see how visitors move around the Site. All information collected by these cookies is aggregated and therefore anonymous. We use Google Analytics for this purpose. Legal basis: Consent.
CookiesPage.ces-cookies-permettent-au-site-de-se-sou: These cookies allow the Site to remember choices you make (such as your language or region) and provide enhanced, more personalized features. They may also be used to provide services you have requested, such as watching a video or commenting on a blog. The information collected by these cookies may be anonymized, and they cannot track your browsing activity on other websites. Legal basis: Consent.
CookiesPage.ces-cookies-sont-utilises-pour-diffuser-: These cookies are used to deliver advertisements more relevant to you and your interests. They are also used to limit the number of times you see an advertisement and to help measure the effectiveness of advertising campaigns. They are usually placed by advertising networks with the website operator's permission. Legal basis: Consent.
CookiesPage.identifie-de-maniere-unique-un-visiteur-: Uniquely identifies a visitor across multiple sessions
CookiesPage.identifie-un-utilisateur-unique-pour-le-: Identifies a unique user for ad tracking and remarketing
CookiesPage.assure-que-les-requetes-des-utilisateurs: Ensures that user requests are not falsified
CookiesPage.stockage-des-preferences-et-informations: Storage of user preferences and session information
CookiesPage.stockage-des-informations-de-session-lie: Storage of session information related to authentication and securing Google accounts
CookiesPage.personnaliser-les-annonces-qui-sont-affi: Personalize ads displayed on Google and its partners
CookiesPage.authentifier-un-utilisateur-lorsque-ce-d: Authenticate a user when they are logged into their Google account
CookiesPage.proteger-les-utilisateurs-contre-certain: Protect users against certain types of attacks, particularly cross-site request forgery attacks
CookiesPage.maintenir-l-authentification-active-lors: Keep authentication active when the user navigates services like Gmail, Google Drive, YouTube
CookiesPage.renforcer-la-securite-de-la-session-de-l: Enhance the security of the session for users logged into their Google account
CookiesPage.maintenir-la-session-d-un-utilisateur-qu: Maintain the session of a user logged into their Google account, ensuring they do not have to reconnect on every page
CookiesPage.assurer-la-securite-des-sessions-utilisa: Ensure the security of user sessions, particularly in the context of Google advertising services
CookiesPage.maintenir-et-securiser-la-session-des-ut: Maintain and secure user sessions when they are logged into their Google accounts
CookiesPage.empecher-les-utilisateurs-d-etre-deconne: Prevent users from being logged out when navigating between Google service pages
CookiesPage.assurer-la-securite-des-sessions-utilisa: Ensure the security of user sessions, particularly when interacting with Google services
CookiesPage.vous-pouvez-gerer-vos-preferences-en-mat: You can manage your cookie preferences at any time:
CookiesPage.lors-de-chaque-session-vous-verrez-appar: During each session, you will see a cookie consent banner. You can accept or refuse non-essential cookies.
CookiesPage.la-plupart-des-navigateurs-web-vous-perm: Most web browsers allow you to control cookies through their settings. You can usually configure your browser to refuse all cookies or to notify you when a cookie is sent. However, if you disable cookies, some parts of our Site may not function properly. For more information on how to manage cookies in your browser, please refer to your browser's documentation.
CookiesPage.lors-de-votre-premiere-visite-sur-notre-: During your first visit to our Site, a cookie consent banner is displayed. This banner allows you to accept or refuse non-essential cookies. Your consent is recorded for a period of 6 months.
CookiesPage.nous-pouvons-mettre-a-jour-cette-politiq: We may update this cookies policy from time to time. Any changes will be published on this page with a revised update date.
CookiesPage.si-vous-avez-des-questions-concernant-ce: If you have any questions regarding this cookies policy, please contact us at:

CGUPage.conditions-generales-d-utilisation-cgu-d: General Terms and Conditions of Use of the fm4all.com website
CGUPage.les-presentes-conditions-generales-d-uti: These General Terms and Conditions of Use aim to define the terms of access and use of the website www.fm4all.com (hereinafter referred to as 'the Site'), published by FM4ALL, a company specializing in facility management.
CGUPage.en-accedant-au-site-l-utilisateur-ci-apr: By accessing the Site, the user (hereinafter referred to as 'the User') fully accepts these Terms and Conditions of Use without reservation. In case of disagreement with these terms, the User is invited not to use the Site.
CGUPage.le-site-est-accessible-gratuitement-a-to: The Site is freely accessible to any User with Internet access. All costs related to accessing the Site (computer equipment, software, Internet connection, etc.) are the responsibility of the User.
CGUPage.fm4all-met-en-oeuvre-tous-les-moyens-rai: FM4ALL makes every reasonable effort to ensure quality access to the Site but is not bound by any obligation of result. Access to the Site may be interrupted for maintenance or other reasons without prior notice.
CGUPage.l-utilisateur-s-engage-a-utiliser-le-sit: The User agrees to use the Site in accordance with these Terms and Conditions of Use and applicable laws. In particular, the User is prohibited from:
CGUPage.d-utiliser-le-site-a-des-fins-illegales-: Using the Site for illegal purposes or purposes prohibited by law.
CGUPage.d-interferer-avec-le-bon-fonctionnement-: Interfering with the proper functioning of the Site.
CGUPage.de-tenter-d-acceder-de-maniere-non-autor: Attempting to gain unauthorized access to FM4ALL's computer systems.
CGUPage.fm4all-s-efforce-de-fournir-des-informat: FM4ALL strives to provide accurate and up-to-date information on the Site. However, FM4ALL does not guarantee the accuracy, completeness, or timeliness of the information provided on the Site.
CGUPage.fm4all-ne-pourra-etre-tenue-responsable-: FM4ALL cannot be held liable for any direct or indirect damage resulting from the use of the Site or the inability to access it.
CGUPage.tous-les-contenus-presents-sur-le-site-t: All content on the Site (texts, images, graphics, logos, icons, software, etc.) is the exclusive property of FM4ALL or its partners.
CGUPage.toute-reproduction-distribution-modifica: Any reproduction, distribution, modification, adaptation, retransmission, or publication, even partial, of these elements is strictly prohibited without the prior written consent of FM4ALL.
CGUPage.l-utilisateur-est-informe-que-lors-de-sa: The User is informed that during their navigation on the Site, personal data may be collected by FM4ALL, notably through contact forms or cookies.
CGUPage.fm4all-s-engage-a-traiter-ces-donnees-co: FM4ALL undertakes to process this data in accordance with its Privacy Policy and in compliance with the applicable regulations on personal data protection (GDPR).
CGUPage.le-site-peut-contenir-des-liens-vers-des: The Site may contain links to third-party websites. FM4ALL exercises no control over these sites and disclaims any responsibility for their content.
CGUPage.l-insertion-de-liens-hypertextes-vers-le: The insertion of hypertext links to the Site is authorized provided it does not harm FM4ALL's image or mislead about the nature of the links with FM4ALL.
CGUPage.8-modification-des-cgu: 8. Modification of the Terms and Conditions of Use
CGUPage.fm4all-se-reserve-le-droit-de-modifier-a: FM4ALL reserves the right to modify these Terms and Conditions of Use at any time. The new terms will apply as soon as they are published on the Site. The User is therefore invited to regularly consult this page to be aware of any updates.
CGUPage.les-presentes-cgu-sont-regies-par-le-dro: These Terms and Conditions of Use are governed by French law. In the event of a dispute regarding the interpretation or execution of these terms, the competent courts of Paris will have exclusive jurisdiction.
